title: elizaos Eliza (2024-12-18)
version: update Node.js version from v23.1.0 to v23.3.0
overview: Development focused on package improvements (React Client fixes), new features (more dependency updates), 45 bug fixes. with 63 contributors merging 118 PRs. Major work included various improvements.

fixes: Integrate jin's docs changes and rebuild docs with a16z
chores: Remove web-agent folder - duplicate of client folder

issues_summary: working on 14 bugs including 'Failed codecov run', 'EVM Plugin can't run any action' and implementing 9 feature requests including 'Upgrade to turborepo for monorepo management', 'Turnkey Integration'
